name: A Hole is ___? Aholis.
description:
AHOLIS is a puzzle game. Fullscreen Recommended at 1920*1080.

All you need to do is not let any block fall till the end. Make holes of the generated blocks shape by "Space-bar". Move using wsad/ arrow keys.

There are 6 different modes for this game. For best results start from "A" till you get the hang of the game. Proceed serially afterwards.

Made for Brackeys Game-jam in 6 days on topic Holes.

Tools Used:

  1. GameEngine: Unity3d
  2. Visual Studio 2019 for c#
  3. BFXR for sound effects
  4. Photoshop art
  5. BFXR sound generator

Assets Used:

  1. SaveGame Free Gold by BayAtGames
  2. Simple UI by Unruly Games
  3. Level Editor using Image Data by Brackeys (modified as per needs) 
  4. splash sound by impsplat (modified as per needs)
  5. Fantom music
  6. AS_Music_FREE
